official-title.#text:
To terminate the authority of the Secretary of Housing
		  and Urban Development to provide assistance under the Tenant Resource Network
		  Program.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Termination of
			 authority to provide assistance under the Tenant Resource Network
			 Program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not carry out, support, or
			 otherwise provide any assistance to the Tenant Resource Network Program
			 authorized under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Housing and Urban Development

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any
			 other provision of law, after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 514(f)(3) of the Department of Veterans Affairs and
			 Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act,
			 1998
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act, 1998/s:514/ss:f/p:3

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 514(f)(3) of the Department of
			 Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies
			 Appropriations Act, 1998
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act, 1998/s:514/ss:f/p:3

header.#text:
Repeal of
			 funding provision for the Tenant Resource Network Program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
that have been allocated for use, but not yet obligated as of the date of
			 the enactment of this Act, for the Tenant Resource Network Program shall not be
			 available for obligation or expenditure under such Program, but should be
			 covered into the General Fund of the Treasury and should be used only for
			 reducing the budget deficit of the Federal Government.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 514(f)(3) of the Department of Veterans Affairs and
			 Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act,
			 1998
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and Independent Agencies Appropriations Act, 1998/s:514/ss:f/p:3
